name: Manic Miner: Neighbours - Allana Truman
summary: Manic Miner: Neighbours - Allana Truman is a MM game based on the Australian television soap opera Neighbours, focusing on plots involving Andrew Broad's favourite character from the show, Allana Truman. Although she was only a guest character, Allana captivated Andrew with her pretty eyes and an intriguing air of mystique from her electric first appearance in November 2000 (as televised in the UK) to her emotional exit in April 2001 when she embarked on a trip around America with her boyfriend, Lance Wilkinson.
